title: 请问玩家名字下面的血条显示的指令是啥？
author: 我是舒琪啦
txt_content: 用指令做到的那个血量显示  20xxxxxx来着的

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
先输入/scoreboard objectives add health health
然后/scoreboard objectives setdisplay belowName health
